name: Asstro-pain
description:
Asstro-Pain 

for Brackeys 2021_2 game jam

Small game about asteroids and lasers

Around you are full of asteroids and all you have is a weak laser gun that can barely penetrate small space debris. You have big problems with movement, since even the simplest maneuvering module is missing on your spacesuit and the only way to dodge danger is the same laser gun! Full chaos!

System requirements:

  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • GPU: 32 mb
  • CPU: intel Pentium 4
  • RAM: 128 mb

Downloads:
